analysis.description:
elenctraToken.startDate (/unique_chucks/31/0x2717ea295168058e783484dc0f3e35e25d6590df.sol#111-112) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- fallback (/unique_chucks/31/0x2717ea295168058e783484dc0f3e35e25d6590df.sol#220-232)

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/31/0x2717ea295168058e783484dc0f3e35e25d6590df.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.18 (/unique_chucks/31/0x2717ea295168058e783484dc0f3e35e25d6590df.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/31/0x2717ea295168058e783484dc0f3e35e25d6590df.sol#89) is not in mixedCase
